item.title: 独家消息消息人士称康卡斯特计划在其最大的宽带和付费电视部门裁员，以集中运营
item.description: 周五，一位熟悉内情的消息人士称，康卡斯特正计划在其最大的部门裁员，该部门包括 Xfinity 互联网、移动和付费电视业务，因为该公司正试图集中运营并加强其宽带业务。【原文：Comcast is planning to cut jobs at its biggest unit that houses its Xfinity internet, mobile and pay television business, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday, as the company attempts to centralize operations and bolster its broadband business.】

item.title: 关税挑战持续，微软再次上调 Xbox 在美国的售价
item.description: 微软周五表示，今年将第二次提高其Xbox游戏机在美国的售价，因为这家云计算巨头的视频游戏部门正在努力应对关税引发的成本压力、激烈的竞争和不确定的支出。【原文：Microsoft said on Friday it is raising the prices of its Xbox gaming consoles in the U.S. for a second time this year, as the cloud giant's video game division grapples with tariff-induced cost pressures, strong competition and uncertain spending.】

item.title: 特朗普称中国习近平批准了 TikTok 协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五表示，他已与中国国家主席习近平达成一致，同意批准就 TikTok 达成一项协议。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Friday that he had agreed with Chinese President Xi Jinping to approve a deal over TikTok.】

item.title: 加密货币托管初创公司 BitGo 申请在美国上市
item.description: 加密货币托管初创公司 BitGo 周五公布了其在美国首次公开募股的文件。【原文：Crypto custody startup BitGo on Friday made public its paperwork for an initial public offering in the United States.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，英国斯塔默将推动数字身份证计划
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）正在推进引入数字身份识别系统的计划，预计最早将在本月的党内会议上宣布。【原文：UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer is moving forward with plans to introduce digital identification systems, with an announcement anticipated as early as his party's conference this month, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，甲骨文正与 Meta 洽谈 200 亿美元的人工智能云计算交易
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，甲骨文公司正在与 Meta 公司洽谈一项价值近 200 亿美元的多年期云计算交易。【原文：Oracle is in talks with Meta for a multi-year cloud computing deal worth nearly $20 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团与 600 名罢工的 UAW 工人达成为期五年的劳资协议
item.description: 通用电气航空航天公司（GE Aerospace）周五表示，该公司与俄亥俄州和肯塔基州分销设施的 600 多名联合汽车工人工会罢工工人达成了为期五年的劳资协议。【原文：GE Aerospace reached a five-year labor agreement with more than 600 striking workers of the United Auto Workers union at its Ohio and Kentucky distribution facilities, the aircraft engine supplier said on Friday.】

item.title: 精神航空工会警告会员，第二次破产将带来更多痛苦
item.description: 根据路透社看到的备忘录，为精神航空公司工作的空乘人员和飞行员工会警告其成员，随着该廉价航空公司加大削减成本的力度，在一年内第二次破产期间将遭受更多痛苦。【原文：Unions for flight attendants and pilots working for Spirit Airlines are warning members of further pain during the budget carrier's second bankruptcy in a year, as it steps up cost-cutting efforts, according to memos seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 旅游科技公司纳凡公开美国首次公开募股申请文件
item.description: 企业差旅和费用公司纳万公司（Navan）周五公布了其在美国首次公开募股的文件。【原文：Corporate travel and expense company Navan on Friday made public its paperwork for an initial public offering in the U.S.】

item.title: Stellantis 推出更轻、充电更快的电动汽车电池
item.description: Stellantis 公司周五发布了一款电动汽车原型，其电池充电更快、更轻、更经济，无需单独的逆变器和充电器。【原文：Stellantis unveiled an electric vehicle prototype on Friday featuring a faster-charging, lighter and more affordable battery that eliminates the need for a separate inverter and charger.】

item.title: 即时观点：分析师对特朗普与习近平就贸易、TikTok 等问题通话的反应
item.description: 据政策专家称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国领导人习近平周五的通话可能降低了超级大国之间的温度，但几乎没有达成什么坚定的协议，而且似乎没有解决嘀嘀打车协议的命运问题。【原文：A phone call between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese leader Xi Jinping on Friday may have lowered the temperature between the superpowers, but it yielded little in the way of firm agreements and appeared to leave the fate of a TikTok deal unresolved, according to policy experts.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平通话后，TikTok 美国资产的出售或将得到推动
item.description: 专家表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平本周在TikTok交易上取得的进展可能有助于促进谈判，允许母公司字节跳动剥离短视频应用在美国的资产。【原文：President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping's progress on a TikTok deal this week could help bolster talks to allow parent ByteDance to divest the U.S. assets of the short video app, experts said.】

item.title: 摩根大通聘请两位资深银行家加强消费者和零售投资团队
item.description: 根据路透社周五看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通聘请了两位董事总经理，以加强其消费者和零售投资银行部门。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has hired two managing directors to strengthen its consumer and retail investment banking unit, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 白宫表示，特朗普将对 H-1B 工人签证征收 10 万美元费用
item.description: 一位白宫官员表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对H-1B工人签证征收10万美元的新申请费，这可能会给严重依赖印度和中国技术工人的科技行业带来沉重打击。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump plans to impose a new $100,000 application fee for H-1B worker visas, a White House official said, potentially dealing a big blow to the technology sector that relies heavily on skilled workers from India and China.】

item.title: 据 Information 报道，苹果已要求供应商提高 iPhone 17 机型的产量
item.description: 据《信息时报》周五援引知情人士的话报道，在上周末强劲的预售订单之后，苹果公司已通知至少两家供应商将入门级型号 iPhone 17 的产量至少提高 30%。【原文：Apple has told at least two suppliers to boost production of the entry-level model iPhone 17 by at least 30% after strong pre-orders last weekend, the Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗集团从 Cboe 挖来 Adam Inzirillo 负责股票业务
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，花旗集团（Citigroup C.N）已聘请 Cboe Global Markets 的 Adam Inzirillo 领导该行股票部门的现金和期货执行平台。【原文：Citigroup C.N has hired Adam Inzirillo from Cboe Global Markets to lead its cash and futures execution platform within the bank’s equities division, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，xAI 以 2000 亿美元估值融资 100 亿美元
item.description: 据 CNBC 周五援引消息人士的话报道，埃隆-马斯克的人工智能公司 xAI 以 2,000 亿美元的估值融资 100 亿美元。【原文：Elon Musk's AI firm xAI has raised $10 billion at a $200 billion valuation, CNBC reported on Friday, citing sources.】

item.title: 据 ET Now 援引 PTI 报道，印度商务部长预计将于近期访问美国
item.description: 印度 ET Now 新闻频道周五援引 PTI 新闻社的报道称，印度商务部长皮尤什-戈亚尔（Piyush Goyal）预计将很快访问华盛顿，进行贸易谈判。【原文：India's Commerce Minister Piyush Goyal is expected to visit Washington soon for trade talks, India's ET Now news channel reported on Friday citing news agency PTI, a trip that would take place amid efforts to ease strained bilateral ties.】

item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 在纳斯达克上市后股价下跌，估值达 23.8 亿美元
item.description: Pattern Group 的股价周五在纳斯达克首次亮相时下跌了近 3.6%，这家电子商务公司的估值为 23.8 亿美元。【原文：Pattern Group's shares fell nearly 3.6% in their Nasdaq debut on Friday, valuing the e-commerce firm at $2.38 billion.】

item.title: 波音防务公司的罢工机工批准了工会提议的合同，但遭到公司拒绝
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）周五宣布，波音防务公司的罢工工人以 90% 的投票率批准了工会领导层提出的为期四年的合同提案，而管理层已经拒绝考虑该提案。【原文：Striking workers at Boeing Defense voted 90% to approve a four-year contract proposal from union leadership that management has already refused to consider, the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) announced Friday.】

item.title: 纽蒙特以约 4.39 亿美元的价格出售全部奥拉股份，推动资产剥离
item.description: 黄金矿商纽蒙特公司周五表示，作为其资产剥离计划的一部分，该公司通过多伦多证券交易所以 4.39 亿美元的价格出售了其在奥拉矿业公司（Orla Mining）的股份。【原文：Gold miner Newmont said on Friday it sold its stake in Orla Mining for $439 million through the Toronto Stock Exchange as part of its divestiture program.】

item.title: 大众汽车因保时捷重组损失 60 亿美元
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司（Volkswagen）周五表示，该公司将因跑车部门保时捷公司（Porsche AG）影响深远的产品改革而蒙受 51 亿欧元（60 亿美元）的损失，同时电动车型的推出也将放缓。【原文：Volkswagen , Europe's largest carmaker, said on Friday it will take a 5.1 billion euro ($6 billion) hit from a far-reaching product overhaul at sportscar division Porsche AG , with slower roll-outs of electric models.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行将于 9 月 25 日将基准利率下调 25 个基点至 7.50
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，墨西哥央行将于 9 月 25 日再次将基准利率下调四分之一个百分点，使其达到 7.50%。【原文：Mexico's central bank is set to again lower its benchmark interest rate by a quarter of a percentage point on September 25, taking it to 7.50%, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 将在五年内斥资 1000 亿美元购买备份服务器
item.description: 据《信息报》周五援引公司高管与股东的讨论报道，OpenAI 计划在未来五年内斥资约 1,000 亿美元从云供应商处租用备份服务器。【原文：OpenAI plans to spend about $100 billion renting backup servers from cloud providers over the next five years, the Information reported on Friday, citing company executives' discussions with shareholders.】

item.title: Monte dei Paschi 在要约收购倒数第二天获得 Mediobanca 70.5% 的股份
item.description: 周五的交易所数据显示，Monte dei Paschi di Siena 已获得 Mediobanca 超过三分之二的资本，超过了推动任何特殊股东决策所需的所有权门槛。【原文：Monte dei Paschi di Siena has secured more than two thirds of Mediobanca's capital, bourse data showed on Friday, crossing the ownership threshold needed to push through any extraordinary shareholder decisions.】

item.title: 菲拉格慕家族重申对任何 "非同寻常 "的交易不感兴趣
item.description: 菲拉格慕家族周五表示，他们对任何涉及同名奢侈品公司的 "特殊交易 "都不感兴趣。【原文：The Ferragamo family said on Friday it was not interested in any kind of "extraordinary transactions" involving the eponymous luxury company.】

item.title: 应业界要求，NHTSA 将新车评级更新推迟一年
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周五表示，在汽车制造商的要求下，该局将推迟实施美国政府于 12 月最终确定的新车评估计划的更新内容。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Friday that it will delay implementation of updates to the U.S. government's New Car Assessment Program finalized in December after a request by automakers.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席称市场可决定公司报告的 "节奏
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周五对CNBC表示，随着监管机构推进唐纳德-特朗普总统关于终止季度报告的要求，投资者和银行可能会帮助制定上市公司报告的新时间表。【原文：Investors and banks are likely to help set any new timeline for public company reporting as regulators press ahead on President Donald Trump's bid to end quarterly reports, U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Paul Atkins told CNBC on Friday.】

item.title: 美国股票基金因投资者获利而大量流出
item.description: 在截至9月17日的一周内，投资者从美国股票基金中撤出了大量资金，因为他们对近期美联储下调政策利率后市场的高估值持谨慎态度，并急于锁定利润。【原文：Investors withdrew massive capital out of U.S. equity funds in the week to Sept. 17 as they turned cautious about the market's lofty valuations following the recent rally through a policy rate cut by the Federal Reserve and rushed to lock in profits.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 与苹果供应商合作制造人工智能设备
item.description: The Information 周五援引知情人士的话报道称，OpenAI 已与苹果设备组装商 Luxshare 签订协议，将生产一款消费类设备。【原文：OpenAI has signed a deal with Apple device assembler, Luxshare , to make a consumer device, the Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
